What's included in Best Buy's Outlet?

Open-Box Tech Deals

Save on PS5 Slim, Xbox Series X, PS Portal & more.

Here's how Best Buy defines the product conditions within its outlet:

  • Refurbished: Products repaired and restored to a like-new state.
  • Open-Box: Products returned under Best Buy's Return & Exchange Promise. Be sure to note which condition you're comfortable with before you check out. There are three open-box types that have all been Geek Squad Verified: Excellent, Good and Fair
